transcript: Trans thoracic echocardiogram, 8 September 2025. Dilated left ventricle, LVEDD 59. Mild systolic dysfunction, EF 43, GLS -16. Bicuspid aortic valve, moderate aortic regurgitation. Mild mitral regurgitation. Moderately dilated left atrium, LAVI 45.
expected_output: TTE (8 Sep 2025): dilated LV (LVEDD 59), mild systolic dysfunction (EF 43), GLS -16, bicuspid aortic valve, mod AR, mild MR, mod dil LA (LAVI 45)
expected_elements: Measurement spacing with spaces not hyphens
Severity abbreviations: mod AR, mod dil LA
GLS with negative sign and space: GLS -16

formatting_rules.parentheses: Measurements quantifying findings go in parentheses: dilated LV (LVEDD 59)
